content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.touch_apps_qt7_selfcap_xpro_board_pic32cm JH01 curiosity pro
content.displayName: Self Capacitance Example for PIC32CM JH Family
content.shortDescription: MPLAB Harmony 3 Touch Library is a royalty-free software library for developing touch applications on 32-bit microcontrollers using the Peripheral Touch Controller (PTC). Developers can use it to integrate touch-sensing capability into their applications. This example application shows how to use self capacitance touch.
content.author: Microchip
subcategories: PIC32CM JH01 Curiosity Pro Evaluation Kit
